title: i really need a bigger friends list
body: 325 frineds is no where near enough friendslist for me is there any way i can buy more space for my friends list hell i would spend 20 bucks if it added 100?

replies.body: Im not at the limit yet, but have a big list of people i like to play with. I don't see why it needs to be limited, except maybe for spam issues. But if there is a cost incurred from an increased limit i think people would be happy to pay. I dont see a downside XD

i am over unfriending some many players daily about ten a day i just wish 1. if someone account gets banned they are deleted from ur friends list 2. there was a way to buy a bigger friendslist hell id pay twenty for it. 3. also maybe something to say last time an account was active so i know who to delete? anyone have any info on how to get a bigger friendlist would help ty guys
